::Zardus::

Zardus looks at Panzertron, thinking over the bot's offer. He nods. Weapons 
won't help him much in this ship anyways, not if the interior defences and 
the whole crew wanted to slagg him.

"We'll take the tour," he says, taking out his Plasma launcher, rapid fire 
rifle, and pistol and handing it to Panzertron.

"Delta, give him your weapons," Zardus orders Delta. He looks back at 
Panzertron.

"Whenever you're ready, Major."
